required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Tumor Landscape Pathological Diagnosis by Large Tissue Sections
clinical_study.official_title: Tumor Landscape Pathological Diagnosis by Large Tissue Sections

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to establish large tissue sections for 10 kinds of tumors. in order to observe the tumor landscape on microscope. The tumors including esophageal carcinoma,gastric carcinoma,hepatocellular carcinoma etc.200 cases of each tumor will be compared by traditional sample method and landscape sample method to testify the clinical value and significance of tumor landscape pathological diagnosis .

primary_outcome.description: 200 cases of prostate carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of liver cancer sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of esophageal carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of gastrointestinal stromal tumor (GIST)sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of colorectal carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of pancreatic carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.

primary_outcome.measure: lung, traditional and landscape sample method
primary_outcome.description: 200 cases of lung cancer sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of renal carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of breast cancer sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.
200 cases of cervical carcinoma sampled by traditional method and landscape method will be compared for precise and comprehensive pathological analysis.

intervention.description: 200 cases of different tumor tissues will be compared by traditional sample method and landscape sample method to testify the clinical value and significance of tumor landscape pathological diagnosis .

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Older than 15-year-old
2. Did not receive preoperative preoperative chemotherapy or radiotherapy
Exclusion Criteria:
patients undergoing preoperative chemotherapy or radiotherapy
